alert.note: Alert for Clay; Jackson; Smith (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 5:32PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Overton, Pickett, southeastern Smith, north central De Kalb, Jackson, eastern Clay, northern Putnam and northwestern Fentress Counties through 615 PM CST... At 531 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Celina to 6 miles southeast of Gordonsville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cookeville, Livingston, Jamestown, Celina, Gainesboro, Byrdstown, Algood, Baxter, Rickman, Pall Mall, and Center Hill Lake. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 262 and 270, and between mile markers 277 and 285. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
